name: sea surface height
comment: Fields include dynamic sea surface height [SSH], sea surface height above the geoid [SSHNOIBC], and the inverse barometer (IB) correction to sea level from atmosphere pressure. Both SSH and SSHNOIBC account for global mean steric sea level changes due to density changes in the Boussinesq volume-conserving model (Greatbatch correction) and the IB correction from sea-ice pressure loading.

name: ocean bottom pressure
comment: Fields include ocean bottom pressure with and without the contribution from atmosphere pressure [OBPGMAP, OBP], anomalies of OBP and OBPGMAP with respect to their 2005-2010 means [OBPAnoma, OBPGMAPA], and model hydrostatic bottom pressure anomaly [PHIBOT]. Ocean bottom pressure fields are provided in terms of equivalent water height.

name: ocean and sea-ice surface freshwater fluxes
fields: EXFpreci, EXFevap, EXFroff, SIsnPrcp, EXFempmr, oceFWflx, SIatmFW, SFLUX, SIacSubl, SIrsSubl, SIfwThru

name: ocean and sea-ice surface heat fluxes
fields: EXFhl, EXFhs, EXFlwdn, EXFswdn, EXFqnet, oceQnet, SIatmQnt, TFLUX, EXFswnet, EXFlwnet, oceQsw, SIaaflux

name: atmosphere surface temperature, humidity, wind, and pressure
fields: EXFatemp, EXFaqh, EXFewind, EXFnwind, EXFwspee, EXFpress

name: sea-ice and snow concentration and thickness
ocean density, stratification, and hydrostatic pressure
